Question: Pimax Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Pimax Technology (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.

Product: Pimax Crystal

- First VR headset with glass aspheric lenses
- Highest pixel density with 2880x2880 pixels per eye
- QLED + MiniLED panels with local dimming
- 120Hz native resolution
- CES 2024 Innovation Awards Honoree in “XR Technologies & Accessories”

Product: 60G AirLink

- Uses 60G mmWave technology for high-speed data transmission
- Ensures low latency, essential for video streaming and VR experiences
Summary_cn:
Pimax Technology (上海) 有限公司。

产品：Pimax Crystal

- 首款使用玻璃非球面镜片的VR头盔
- 每只眼睛的像素密度最高为2880x2880像素
- 采用QLED + MiniLED面板，配备局部调光功能
- 原生分辨率为120Hz
- 荣获CES 2024创新奖“XR技术与配件”类别荣誉

产品：60G AirLink

- 使用60G毫米波技术进行高速数据传输
- 保证低延迟，对视频流媒体和VR体验至关重要
